title: I don't wanna complain about this, but why is Invasion Star Guardian event and not Arcade?
body: This gamemode seems to be literally about minigames, leveling gradually and even fighting boss fights. It screams Arcade very loudly. Just really don't understand any logic here. Is it because Star Guardian merch would sell better or anything else? Because this mode just fits Arcade perfectly...
